column5: Hey guys, I know its a long shot but a friend of mine was fishing near the public dock onscugog out at cessaria and he lost his tackle box there, its small but it had his fishing license and boaters card in it. He also has had that for a realy long time. Its an old plastic flamboux tan and purple one. If any saw and picked up it would be great if you could shoot me a line. Thanks.
Check with Lincoln as I think he is in the area.  The person who found it may have ditched the cards and they could be on the ground in the area...
